results.title: Role of the renal nerves in modulating renin release during pressure reduction at the feline kidney.
results.text_hl: @GENE_REN @GENE_101081695 @@@Renin@@@ secretion was increased, but significantly less than in the absence of @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@. Simultaneous carotid sinus and @<m>DISEASE_Glycosuria_Renal</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006030 @@@renal pressure@@@ reductions during @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ administration had no effect on renal haemodynamics, reduced @CHEMICAL_Sodium @CHEMICAL_MESH:D012964 @@@sodium@@@ excretion and increased @GENE_REN @GENE_101081695 @@@renin@@@ secretion, the magnitude of which was significantly greater than that recorded with only @<m>DISEASE_Glycosuria_Renal</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006030 @@@renal pressure@@@ reduction in the presence of @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@.

citations.NLM: Johns EJ. Role of the renal nerves in modulating renin release during pressure reduction at the feline kidney. Clin Sci (Lond). 1985 Aug;69(2):185-95. PMID: 3905212
citations.BibTeX: @article{3905212, title={Role of the renal nerves in modulating renin release during pressure reduction at the feline kidney.}, author={Johns EJ}, journal={Clin Sci (Lond)}, volume={69}, number={2}, pages={185-95}}

results.title: Cardiac Inflammation after Ischemia-Reperfusion of the Kidney: Role of the Sympathetic Nervous System and the Renin-Angiotensin System.
results.text_hl: @GENE_NPPA @GENE_230899 @@@ANF@@@, a marker of @DISEASE_Heart_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D006331 @@@cardiac lesion@@@, increased after @<m>DISEASE_Glycosuria_Renal</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006030 @@@renal@@@ I/@DISEASE_Ring_Chromosome_20_Syndrome @DISEASE_MESH:C580424 @@@R@@@, the values being restored to the level of Sham group after @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ or @CHEMICAL_Enalapril @CHEMICAL_MESH:D004656 @@@enalapril@@@ treatment.

citations.NLM: Panico K, Abrahão MV, Trentin-Sonoda M, Muzi-Filho H, Vieyra A, Carneiro-Ramos MS. Cardiac Inflammation after Ischemia-Reperfusion of the Kidney: Role of the Sympathetic Nervous System and the Renin-Angiotensin System. Cell Physiol Biochem. 2019;53(4):587-605. PMID: 31535830
